<div class="center-text">
# mlr(3): Machine Learning in R
</div>
An open-source collection of R packages providing a unified interface for machine learning in the R language.


```{r}
#| echo: false
library(mlr3misc)
library(htmltools)
library(data.table)
content = rowwise_table(
    ~icon,          ~text,                                                    ~link,
    "code-square",  "A scientifically designed and easy to learn interface.", "index.html",
    "pen",          "More than 100 connected machine learning algorithms.",   "learners.html",
    "box",          "Light on dependencies.",                                 "index.html",
    "stack",        "Convenient parallelization with the future package.",    "https://futureverse.org/",
    "sliders",      "State-of-the-art optimization algorithms.",              "tuners.html",
    "share",        "Dataflow programming with pipelines.",                   "https://mlr3pipelines.mlr-org.com/"
)
div(class = "feature-grid",
  pmap(content, function(icon, text, link) {
    div(class = "feature-grid__item",
        div(class="feature-grid__icon",
          a(href = link, class = "feature-grid__a",
            tags$i(class = sprintf("bi-%s feature-grid__i", icon))
         )
       ),
      text
    )
  })
)
```

## Examples

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#| echo: false
library(mlr3misc)
library(htmltools)
library(data.table)

content = rowwise_table(
  ~name,                    ~icon,      ~url,                                                                       ~text,                                                     ~objective,
  "Basic Machine Learning", "pen",      "gallery/2020-03-18-iris-mlr3-basics/",                                     "Basic machine learning",                                   list(list("Learner", "Task", "Resampling")),
  "Optimization",           "sliders",  "gallery/2022-11-10-hyperparameter-optimization-on-the-palmer-penguins/",   "Hyperparameter tuning of a support vector machine",        list(list("Tuning Space", "Tuning", "Nested Resampling")),
  "Pipelines",              "share",    "gallery/2020-03-11-mlr3pipelines-tutorial-german-credit/",                 "Preprocessing pipelines", list(list("Pipelines", "Missing Values", "Optimization")),
  "Feature Selection",      "funnel",   "gallery/2020-09-14-mlr3fselect-basic/",                                    "Feature Selection on the Titanic data set", list(list("Sequential Feature Selection", "Nested Resampling"))
)

div(class = "grid grid-two",
  pmap(content, function(name, icon, url, text, objective) {
      div(class = "grid__item",
        h3(class = "grid__title",
          tags$i(class = sprintf("bi-%s grid__title-icon", icon)),
          HTML("&nbsp;"),
          name
        ),
        p(paste0(text, ".")),
        a(href = url, span(class = "grid__link-box")),
        tags$ul(class = "grid__list",
          map(objective, function(x) tags$li(x))
        )
      )
  })
)
```
